newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Also ups IBM, Microsoft links.
newsitem.headline: Also ups IBM, Microsoft links.

text.p: ALSO Holding AG said its German unit had expanded cooperation with IBM and Microsoft in agreements that should boost turnover by 15 million to 20 million marks a year.
IBM picked ALSO as its exclusive partner to supply its distribution companies in Germany. Microsoft is using ALSO to deliver entertainment software to bookstores, it said.
It said in a statement the German unit had posted more than 100 million marks in 1996 turnover with the five leading computer industry producers.
"The 50 percent sales rise planned for 1997 should be achieved given these additional agreements as well as the growing recognition of logistical performance in the distribution business," it said.
"In addition, ALSO Germany was able to boost its margins compared with the previous year. From today's perspective, an improvement in the German unit's earnings situation is thus expected," it said.
